@graph.name: Tiramisu Cheesecake Brownies. Glutenfree Vegan Nutfree Recipe - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: Gluten-free Vegan Tiramisu Cheesecake Brownies! Tried, tested and loved. Easy and ready within the hour. Keep these around this holiday season. Gluten-free Vegan Recipe

itemListElement.name: Tiramisu Cheesecake Brownies. Glutenfree Vegan Nutfree Recipe

@graph.name: Tiramisu Cheesecake Brownies. Glutenfree Vegan Nutfree Recipe
@graph.description: These Tiramisu Cheesecake Brownies are 3 desserts in one. always a hit! Free of dairy, egg, gluten, yeast, nut. Makes a medium loaf ( 8 by 4.5 inch). Double the recipe for a 8 by 8 inch brownie pan.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup oat flour (I grind my own old fashioned Oats)
1/4 cup coconut flour (or cashew flour or light/medium GF flour)
1/2  bar 70% Dark Chocolate Theo bar - 1.5 oz - 42 gms (1/3 cup dark chocolate chunks or vegan chocolate chips)
1 tsp instant coffee (omit for regular brownie or if you plan to soak them with prepared coffee later)
1/4 cup ground raw sugar (2 Tbsp for less sweeter)
8 oz firm tofu  (I used Nasoya Organic firm)
2 Tbsp coconut flour (or a Tbsp cornstarch)

itemListElement.text: In a bowl, add all the dry ingredients under Brownie and mix well. Heat non dairy milk and maple syrup until hot (in pan or microwave). Whisk in the dark chocolate and flax seed meal until the chocolate melts. Add the rest of the ingredients and mix well. Add the wet mixture into dry and mix to combine. Mix in 1/4 cup chocolate chips into the batter. Drop the batter onto prepared parchment lined pan. Spread it using a spatula to a level it. Reserve a Tablespoon of the batter to make swirls on top(optional).
itemListElement.name: In a bowl, add all the dry ingredients under Brownie and mix well. Heat non dairy milk and maple syrup until hot (in pan or microwave). Whisk in the dark chocolate and flax seed meal until the chocolate melts. Add the rest of the ingredients and mix well. Add the wet mixture into dry and mix to combine. Mix in 1/4 cup chocolate chips into the batter. Drop the batter onto prepared parchment lined pan. Spread it using a spatula to a level it. Reserve a Tablespoon of the batter to make swirls on top(optional).

itemListElement.text: Lightly squeeze the Tofu to remove excess water and add to blender. Blend all the cheese cake ingredients in a blender until smooth. Taste and adjust/add lemon juice and salt to preferred tang/cream cheese-y taste. Drop the blended batter onto brownie batter. Spread evenly with a spatula. (To make soy-free cheesecake layer, use the cashew filling from these cheesecakes.
itemListElement.name: Lightly squeeze the Tofu to remove excess water and add to blender. Blend all the cheese cake ingredients in a blender until smooth. Taste and adjust/add lemon juice and salt to preferred tang/cream cheese-y taste. Drop the blended batter onto brownie batter. Spread evenly with a spatula. (To make soy-free cheesecake layer, use the cashew filling from these cheesecakes.

itemListElement.text: If making swirls on top, add 2 tsps non dairy milk to the reserved brownie batter (the batter is quite thick). Mix well and drop spoon fulls on top. Swirl the brownie batter into the cheesecake batter with a knife. If using a regular metal pan, place the pan on a baking sheet during baking so the bottom of the brownie does not get hard/overbaked.
itemListElement.name: If making swirls on top, add 2 tsps non dairy milk to the reserved brownie batter (the batter is quite thick). Mix well and drop spoon fulls on top. Swirl the brownie batter into the cheesecake batter with a knife. If using a regular metal pan, place the pan on a baking sheet during baking so the bottom of the brownie does not get hard/overbaked.

itemListElement.text: Bake at preheated 350 degrees F / 180ºc for 40 to 45 minutes or until the center is set and the edges of the cheesecake start to get golden. Cool completely and slice. Refrigerate for half an hour before slicing for best results.
itemListElement.name: Bake at preheated 350 degrees F / 180ºc for 40 to 45 minutes or until the center is set and the edges of the cheesecake start to get golden. Cool completely and slice. Refrigerate for half an hour before slicing for best results.

itemListElement.text: Sprinkle sweetened cocoa powder on top. You can also soak the brownie layer in a little espresso + sugar + rum/liquor of choice.
itemListElement.name: Sprinkle sweetened cocoa powder on top. You can also soak the brownie layer in a little espresso + sugar + rum/liquor of choice.

itemListElement.text: Notes: Add rum extract to the brownie batter or cheesecake batter if you have some. To make just the Glutenfree brownies, double the recipe, add 1/4 cup chocolate chips to the batter. Add more oat flour if needed and bake for 30-35 minutes or until a toothpick from an inch from the edge comes out almost clean.
itemListElement.name: Notes: Add rum extract to the brownie batter or cheesecake batter if you have some. To make just the Glutenfree brownies, double the recipe, add 1/4 cup chocolate chips to the batter. Add more oat flour if needed and bake for 30-35 minutes or until a toothpick from an inch from the edge comes out almost clean.
